random.li: Sadness is something we all have in common. Is there solace in that?
Throughout history, sadness has been linked to the weather.
I forcast deep depressions, grey skies.
I`m sorry, no one wants you to feel that way. Can I help?
Feeling sad is no crime although the world might wish you to think so.
All the feelings in the world never did anybody any harm.
It is our feelings that make us human and connect us to the rest of humanity.
When you feel sad, it is important to give yourself permission to feel the sadness.
Share your feelings with someone who has the sensitivity to give you the space to let the feeling fully be felt.
